title: Dark and Stormy
instructions: Mix rum with fresh lime juice.
Then place it in a tall glass with ice.
Add ginger beer Garnish with lime wedge.

title: Original 1940s Mai Tai
instructions: Place all the ingredients into a cocktail shaker, add ice, and shake it well.
Place the Dark rum on top of the drink. This will let it float.
Strain into a glass. Garnish with mint leaves, cherries, lime, or even pineapple.
This drink is great for impressing guests at your next summer party!

title: Opulent Rum Daiquiri
instructions: Combine all three into a shaker filled with ice.
Strain into a Nick & Nora glass.
Add a pineapple for garnish.

title: Rum Old Fashioned
instructions: Place a large ice cube into an old fashioned glass.
Place the rum, Demerara, and the orange bitter into the glass. Stir until well mixed.
Lastly garnish with an orange peel to add that beautiful vintage look.
